title: Opening Day Preview with Jayson Stark
description: ESPN's Jayson Stark tells Chuck which teams could upset the National League elite, why the World Baseball Classic could be the future of baseball, and why politics remains outside of the MLB locker room.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
